content: Rich and a part of my Chess family. The puzzles are what I call "pure". Thanks..Job well done!

It's excellent in almost every regard, EXCEPT: Many puzzles have at least two possible solutions, but it recognises only one. Ok, I could live with that. But openings ("debut") is total fail. For starters, why on earth are variations for white and black side different? What's the point of not being able to practice same variation from both sides? Just look at the very first variation King's Gambit. It's a shame.We also need option to skip animation. No need to force watching it every time.

I really enjoy this app. I have been playing chess for a while, but never really took time to study the game. Now I want to focus on improving my play by learning what would be the best open for me as black and white. I really like that you proved many chess openings and their variations, however one of the openings I wanted to look at for black against e4 is the Caro-Kann. Could you all include that opening?

Solid App for me to learn about Chess. Has Tactics, puzzles, openings and endgame lessons. Good stuff for little money great job. Controls could be improved with drag and drop. Also missing a few openings like the english for example. Other than that very happy and learning tons. Thx! :)
replyContent: Thank you very much for your kind words and suggestions for improvement. We plan to continue adding new sections and openings in the future. We wish you a pleasant game and beautiful victories in chess!

content: I purchased the PRO version but all my progress disappeared. How to update the progress?
replyContent: Thank you for your feedback. "Chess coach pro" is a separate standalone application that is installed on your device after purchase. We recommend re-solving chess exercises, because it improves your chess skills. We wish you a pleasant game.

content: I see what you're saying. I'll just ignore the stats as they're basically nonsense as accidental touches do happen because I'm on a phone not OTB. I'm never gonna try and take my own king going the wrong way on the board with a pawn. I know it's a wrong move and one that would never happen regardless of where you were. You shouldn't even be playing in a tournament if that move was a consideration. Still, good app regardless of the straightness of the dev.
replyContent: Thank you for your feedback. Offline is available in the app and you can solve puzzles in airplane mode. We understand this cannot protect you from accidental touches, but chess requires attention and accuracy itself. Imagine that you are playing a real game. Also you can reset your stats at any time and start over. We wish you a pleasant game.

content: Disappointed. Bought the pro version because I wanted more puzzles per theme for my wife's training. Shocked to discover it doesn't contain anymore. 100 puzzles per theme is ridiculously tiny. Perhaps you are just a programmer and have never taught chess. That would be my guess by your reply. The problem is that when training someone from zero, 100 easy problems will likely not be enough to switch to medium and there is no way 100 medium difficulty problems will be enough to move to hard.
replyContent: Thank you for your feedback. The paid version has more convenience for training: no ads, no internet required, there are exclusive sections with debuts. If you have finished solving 100 exercises, then you can do them again. In our opinion, repetitive exercise will improve your playing skills. It trains intuitive tactical idea detection.

content: There seems to be a bug - if i choose to not show the cup for challenges, the statistics stops counting the puzzles i have solved
replyContent: Thank you for your feedback and rating! We fixed the bug. Please update the app. Thank you very much for helping to make the game better. We wish you a pleasant game and beautiful victories in chess!

content: Great app. Far exceeded my expectations. First app I purchased where I feel like I'm getting more than my money's worth. Great job developers. Superior app.
replyContent: Thank you very much for your kind words and rating. We wish you a pleasant game and beautiful victories in chess!

content: Top contender for chess puzzles app when compared to the others. I'm a beginner and training with this app. It is one of the very few apps that let me target what kind of tactic I want to attempt and choose difficulty. It has a simple fast interface. Maybe have an option to automatically go to next puzzle after finding solution? Happy with the product. Thank you!

I know there is only one solution to the problem, and that's good because it is supposed to be like that. However, i wasn't referring to that. The stats in the app are inaccurate because the app counts attempts of deselecting a piece as a wrong move. Pressing on an illegal square to deselect is considered a wrong move. Pressing on another piece is also considered a wrong. This is frustrating; the app says you made a wrong move, when in fact no move has been made.
replyContent: Thank you for your feedback. In a real game you can't take one piece, then change your mind, put it back and take another. The app is implemented on the same principle. Thus, the player develops the skill to see a position without touching anything.By popular demand, we added the ability to cancel, you just need to click on it again (put it back).

content: I was cheated by app . I wasted a lot of money for it . It doesn't have data about opening . It doesn't matter if you are practicing the unsolved games . It would be good if you develop something on opening
replyContent: Thank you for your feedback. This app is a collection of chess problems and openings. It has neither an engine nor a game simulator. It is designed to practice game techniques and skills. But there isn't game itself. In the "Debut" section users must repeat the debut steps shown to them. In this way they memorize common techniques in debuts.

content: Great chess app to help you sharpen all aspects of your game. Highly recommended!
replyContent: Thank you for your kind words and 5 stars! We really appreciate it.

content: Great app. It would be great if you can add a few videos explaining different openings, strategies and tactics.
Some the puzzles don't make much sense, but the majority are fine
replyContent: Thank you for your feedback! This app is suitable for both novice and more experienced players. Perhaps you are already playing well and therefore some tasks seem too easy for you. In any case we wish you a pleasant game and beautiful victories in chess. We hope you will rate this app better in the future.

content: Love the app but would love if there more openings to study from
Great apps for training chess
I'm not very good at chess but I love it and this app really helps me develop so much understanding of the game and so enjoy even more playing.
replyContent: Thank you for your comment and rating! Please update the app to the latest version.

content: Too many mistakes in the content
replyContent: Thank you for your feedback. If you find an error in the exercise, please write the section, difficulty level, number, and comment on what exactly the error is. We will study this carefully and improve the exercise. But not all exercises are simple, some have tricks that are invisible at first glance. We wish you a pleasant game!

content: You get a lot of insights and practice!

It's pretty good. I only play the 'challenge' section because that mixes through different types of puzzles. The openings trainer is too limited and not worth using. The puzzles are ok though. I have a similar app for the go game that if you make a wrong response it shows you why it's wrong. This one doesn't do that. If it did I'd give it 4 stars instead of 3

Absolutely love the app, learning so many tricks and learning to look at the game of chess differently, however 2 things that I think could be changed are the fact that when you buy the pro version, you basically start over again and maybe a little write up or explanation of what it is you are looking for in each section. For example I had to Google what a perpetual check was. Maybe give examples in situations as to why we'd want to do that if that makes sense. Other than that love the app
replyContent: Thank you for your feedback! In each section there is a menu item "Info", which explains what to do. After solving 5-10 tasks the user understands the idea and solves puzzles easier. Chess exercises are based on the principle from simple to complex. All chess puzzles have only 1 correct solution. We wish you a pleasant game and beautiful victories!

content: Not to learn the game. I can't find how to teach someone the rules.
replyContent: Thank you for your feedback. In each section there is a menu item "Info", which explains what to do. If you are a beginner, you need to remember how the pieces move (you can find it on the Internet). We recommend to start solving problems from the "Checkmate" section. This app is suitable for both beginners and more experienced players.

content: Tricks are very less in number.
for this much size the app is excellent, covers major topics, good for all level players
Great for improvement

Not bad but needs work. The app crashes periodically. It allows me to choose illegal moves, e.g. when I play white, it allows me to choose a move for black. But overall it's a decent collection of puzzles, debuts, and tricks. I can track my progress, save puzzles into favorites, and progress from easier to more challenging levels and puzzles.

The app is great and love it so many puzzles Few suggestions i would like to give 1. Graphic is ok, especially the movement of pieces , any animation if given would be great 2. Due to mobile dark mode the piece are difficult to understand... So for game the dark mode has to be everytime enabled and disabled 2. There are some games which has multiple solutions, but that is fine if all possible way is not considered... If worked on it will be better

The app works really well. The customization isn't mind-blowing but I don't play chess for dazzling graphics. I tested it out for a couple of weeks and then decided to buy it. Pleased with my purchase. I would have appreciated a legend, if you will, of what the various icons mean but I eventually figured it all out.
Very useful app to practice tactics. The price is also good.
good
Best Chess APP FOR PUZZLES, Middle/End game
replyContent:
Thank you for 5 stars and comment!
We wish you a pleasant game.

content: Superb..worth every penny..6/5 stars

Good chess application if you wish to improve your play. Unfortunately, this app is not without problems. Computers do not make errors, people do. There is no such thing as a perfectly made program. For this reason, I can't give this application a 5 star. Even future updates will result in errors. The issues that I have discovered so far are with forks on the easy level. Like giving me the wrong move when I reset the progress and on problem 9 not being a fork, but a checkmate in two.

I like the app. I guess if you can also do simple training scenarios for basic openings that will make the app even greater. As there are many openings scenarios, you can probably highlight to the trainer their mistakes in responding to the other player's move and suggest better moves with explanations. This can be extended further than opening but doing it for opening and integrating it with this app is excellent.
Great app! Totally worth its price. Great chess puzzles, openings, endings, and defences/attacks. Great for leaning combinations and positions. Pay once, learn always! :)
It is very hard to uderstand the color of your materials. Ugly design which can not be changed. I've tried commercial version (purchased it) and problem has not been resolved.
replyContent:
Thank you for your feedback. Email us a letter for a refund for your purchase. Mail: info.kemigogames@gmail.com
The problem with colors in the application is related to the modification of the Android 10 OS by the manufacturer of your device. We hope that in the future the manufacturer will improve the Android OS and the problem will disappear.

content: The game does what it says. I think that it is assumed that if something is a chess game there will be a way to play chess. This is just puzzles and I feel deceived.
replyContent: Thank you for your feedback. There is no way to play chess with a computer or another player in the application. The application contains themed chess puzzles, openings, chessboard simulator. There are free versions that help you understand what exactly is inside the application. Write us a message: info.kemigogames@gmail.com

content: Good
Chess Coach Pro is excellent for tactics training.
Very nice chess training app. I would like to have an option to select 1 exercise everyday and have a notification
replyContent: Thank you for your comment and rating! We will try consider your wishes.

content: Great app for beginners to expert level. I suggest to add more openings we can learn to improve our opening strategy for better positioning. Great App.

I really like this app I hope it makes me a master player with a ELO rating of a master player but it has errors. Position 25 Easy level makes no sense how can I lose my strongest piece and yet still win the game with two knights when one of my knights can be eaten . I am sure to this is not the only error in this game if I saw this one error. Developer please correct all errors when creating a game especially one that teaches how to play a rule based game.
replyContent: Thank you for your feedback. Please write the name of the section. We will carefully review the exercise and improve it. We wish you a pleasant game and beautiful victories in chess!

content: Dark mode work just bad, and can't turn off just for this app

content: Very fun and lots of content. I do wish that for the opening sections, that if a line has a name or is a variation with specific terminology that it would be included.

The game has a very good tutorial to better your tactics. I have noticed an error in the Decoy hard levels on position 42, as you are instructed to move as black, but the hints clearly show that you are to play as white.

Great app overal so far. The failure trigger is too sensitive being set off with invalid moves. This is an issue because I have a habit of selecting peices while thinking then trying to de-select or select the piece I plan to move sets off failure. Sometimes I'll have 5 failures while I'm trying to select the peice I want to move because it's saying piece A to piece B is invalid. It would also be nice for the championship matches to have player color labels so we know who's playing what color

Please add a "random" option. It will just show one random puzzle from any section. It shouldn't even say whether it's "mate in 1" etc. This will be very useful to understand how will are we evaluating a situation.
Not always the best solution but I still get a good brain work out.
Very good for self learning
Excellent app for chess aspirants. My kid using this app very effiiciently and she is doing good in chess. Exspecially 1move mate, 2 move mate and 3 move mate puzzles are awesome....

This app is terrible. The game forces you to make moves and you have no freedom. Then you are handed the win since the opponent will make a obviously bad move (such as not attacking your pieces - eg. You are encouraged to move your knight into a pawn with no support and then the opponent will make a totally random move such as moving a pawn on the opposite side of the board to give you the win). Everything is hard coded in. Don't waste your money on this, you won't learn anything
replyContent: Thank you for your feedback. Our app is a collection of chess puzzles (more than 4000 puzzles). It doesn't have any artificial intelligence. content: This application is very good, I like it. I have pro version - no ads, yeah. Still (even after updates) there is a bug in idea of grabbing piece and leave it. content: Awesome app!! Definitely worth paying the $4.99 upgrade. content: Good but can be perfected in future. Suggest to include and explain concept/examples for each tactical and strategical themes before going to the exercise. Summary, separate into opening, middle game and endgame themes with focusing in positions (tactical and strategical).
replyContent:
Thank you for 4 stars and comment! A brief description of each section we have prepared - when you are in the training section "Mate in 1" then at the top right there is an information icon "i". Similar descriptions are in other sections of "Training".

content:
I think it's wonderful to improve your chess skills. Problem solving 
exercises at different levels is very useful. My 9 years old daughter is 
also loving it. But opening options are very limited. I think this is the 
only weakness of this app. However, I'd still love to give it a 5 Star 
rating. N.B: After paying for this app I received another 5 SMS notifying 
me of other payments, which I didn't indulge. I'd like to draw the 
attention of Google play store regarding this issue. I had to block my 
Credit Card to stop those payments.
replyContent: Thank you for your comment and rating!

content:
Good inexpensive chess trainer, let's you repeat to learn patterns with no 
fuss on errors or rating distractions. I like having 100 organised problems 
in blocks, letting you tackle easy "in 2" combos or harder to see "in 1" as 
you feel like. My UI niggles are changing board colours is not persistent 
and I would like to be able to select a target square and then the piece, 
which avoids fat finger blunders. Also, going back from 1 should loop to 
last ex in block 100. Also a table view of the block to allow fast 
navigation to revise 10 or 20 exercises at a time would help.
replyContent: Thank you for your comment and rating! We'll try to consider your ideas.
